where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( csa <* composite_shape_aspect | sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( csa , 'electronic_assembly_interconnect_and_packaging_design.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'composing' ) ) ) < 2 ) ) = 0

where.label: wr2
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( csa <* composite_shape_aspect | not ( ( sizeof ( typeof ( csa ) ) > 2 ) or ( csa \ shape_aspect . description <> '' ) or ( csa \ shape_aspect . name <> '' ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: wr1
